generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved surface with white lane markings and crosswalks, typical of a road where vehicles and pedestrians move.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible along the edges of the road, separated by curbs and pedestrian crossings, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows, commercial signs, and architectural details are visible throughout the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are present along the sidewalks and in the background.
- terrain: Grass patches and small landscaped areas with plants are visible along the curb on the right side.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking across the street and on the sidewalks.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible on the road in the distance.
- bus: A red bus is visible on the road in the distance.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, including one red light on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign with an arrow and a "No Entry" sign on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is partially visible on the left side of the image, near the curb.
- bicycle: A bicycle is partially visible on the left side of the image, near the curb.
